Prop.Name: Width
Prop.Description: Control width. Ignored if Nested is false.

Prop.Name: Height
Prop.Description: Control height. Ignored if Nested is false.

Prop.Name: Cls
Prop.Description: An optional extra CSS class that will be added to this control's element. This can be useful for adding customized styles to the component or any of its children using standard CSS rules.

Prop.Name: Nested
Prop.Description: Set to true if you want to nest this control inside another control. Set to false if you want it to render itself to the document body, and automatically size itself to the size of the browser viewport and manage window resizing.

Prop.Name: NorthHidden
Prop.Description: Set to true if you want to hide this region.

Prop.Name: NorthSplit
Prop.Description: Set to true if you want to enable a splitbar in this region.

Prop.Name: NorthAutoScroll
Prop.Description: Set to true True to show scroll bars automatically when necessary, false to clip any overflowing content.

Prop.Name: NorthMargins
Prop.Description: Region margins in the format: top, right, bottom, left.

Prop.Name: NorthBorder
Prop.Description: True to display the borders of the region's body element, false to hide them (defaults to true).

Prop.Name: NorthLayout
Prop.Description: The layout type to be used in this container.

Prop.Name: NorthDragDropMode
Prop.Description: Region panels drag/drop mode. Set to Portal if you want the panels to be layed out in a grid fashion and to allow panel draggin in a portal fashion. Set to Floating if you want to allow the panels to float freely over the region. Set to disabled for default behavior.

Prop.Name: NorthTitleBar
Prop.Description: True to show the title bar on top of the region.

Prop.Name: NorthTitle
Prop.Description: The title text to display in the title bar. When a title is specified the header element will automatically be created and displayed unless the title bar is explicitly set to false.

Prop.Name: NorthHeight
Prop.Description: Region height in pixels.

Prop.Name: NorthMinHeight
Prop.Description: Region minimum height in pixels.

Prop.Name: NorthMaxHeight
Prop.Description: Region maximum height in pixels.

Prop.Name: NorthCollapsible
Prop.Description: True to allow the user to collapse this region. If true, an expand/collapse tool button will automatically be rendered into the title bar of the region, otherwise the button will not be shown. Note that a title bar is required to display the toggle button.

Prop.Name: NorthCollapsed
Prop.Description: True to render the region collapsed, false to render it expanded.

Prop.Name: NorthCollapseMode
Prop.Description: True to allow the user to collapse this region. If true, an expand/collapse tool button will automatically be rendered into the title bar of the region, otherwise the button will not be shown. Note that a title bar is required to display the toggle button.

Prop.Name: NorthCollapsedMargins
Prop.Description: Region margins when collapsed, in the format: top, right, bottom, left.

Prop.Name: NorthFloatable
Prop.Description: True to allow clicking a collapsed region's bar to display the region's panel floated above the layout, false to force the user to fully expand a collapsed region by clicking the expand button to see it again.

Prop.Name: NorthAutoHide
Prop.Description: When a collapsed region's bar is clicked, the region's panel will be displayed as a floated panel. If autoHide is true, the panel will automatically hide after the user mouses out of the panel. If autoHide is false, the panel will continue to display until the user clicks outside of the panel.

Prop.Name: NorthAnimate
Prop.Description: True to animate resizing, collapsing and floating actions.

Prop.Name: NorthDuration
Prop.Description: Animation duration if Animate is true.

Prop.Name: Stateful
Prop.Description: A flag which causes the Component to attempt to restore the state of internal properties from a saved state on startup.

Prop.Name: StateId
Prop.Description: The unique id for this component to use for state management purposes.
